grid.title: Grid
grid.description: Makes the post lists a grid rather than a column.

thumbSize.title: Thumbnail Size
thumbSize.description: The resolution to make thumbnails. 64x64 will disable video thumbnails.

language.title: Language
language.description: The language the UI is in. See an inaccurate or missing translation? Make a pull request.

email.title: Email
email.description: Your account email for logging in.

bio.title: Bio
bio.description: A description displayed on your profile page.

avatar.title: Avatar
avatar.description: The avatar displayed on your profile and comments.

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.description: This will permanently remove all content you have created. Type "delete my account" to confirm.
